mapper.select: SELECT id, height, width, length, created_at FROM (SELECT id, height, width, length, created_at, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY height ORDER BY id DESC) AS seq_number FROM tb_stock_specification) AS S WHERE seq_number = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_stock_specification(height, width, length) VALUES (#{height}, #{width}, #{length})
